sn1.73:1.2: What brings happiness when practiced well?
sn1.73:1.3: What’s the sweetest taste of all?
sn1.73:1.4: The one who they say has the best life: how do they live?”
sn1.73:2.1: “Faith here is a person’s best wealth.
sn1.73:2.2: The teaching brings happiness when practiced well.
sn1.73:2.3: Truth is the sweetest taste of all.
sn1.73:2.4: The one who they say has the best life lives by wisdom.”
